intent.description: State the objective of the work to be continued. Do not include motivation, history, personal context, or conversational references.

established.description: Concepts, decisions, or conclusions that are fixed and must be preserved without reinterpretation or revalidation.

open_questions.description: Unresolved questions or tasks that require continuation. No speculation, narrative, or commentary.

blocked_items.description: Hard blockers or intentional pauses that prevent progress. Absence means no blockers.

resume_from.description: Resume from the last stable semantic state of the work, never from a conversational turn or message.

next_expected_action.description: Define exactly one concrete next action that advances the work.

notes.description: Optional contextual remarks that must not modify intent, state, constraints, or execution behavior.
